item.description:
October 11, 2009 Newport Vineyards

I called today about this event - I was told this is a laid back walking open house type event. I changed the time to 1:30 since there were a lot of reservations at 12:30 and it was suggested by the Winery.
Entry is $10 per person - it includes wine tasting, an open house tour, live music, and a logo wine glass
(case club members complimentary). I was told the event accepts CASH only only for its Festivals.[/u]
Food station and hay ride tickets can be purchased for $5.00.

They would like some RSVP's therefore I changed the RSVP date to Thursday so we can get an updated count. If you would like to RSVP after that date please email me. Thank you.

Harvest Open House

Wine tasting, live music by local Beatles' tribute band "Abbey Rhode" (I have heard this tribue band play in Bristol they are fun!), and a selection of locally grown gourmet bites. Food stations from McGrath's Fine Catering including burger "sliders" from Aquidneck Farms grass fed beef, chowder and stuffies, local cheese, and more. Fatulli's will have mouth watering offerings. Stop in and treat your senses.

Please check the Meetup site the morning of this event in case of cancellation due to low participation and/or severe weather.
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet/greet at 1:30 by large wooden barrel to the right facing front door, after that call my cell 401-829-8516.
item.name: Fall Celebration at Newport Vineyards - Wine, Live Music, & Food.
